Verses: 1 pinnoru Naalile Dhevapuththirar Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vandhu Nindrapodhu, Saaththaanum Avargal Naduvile Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vandhu Nindraan.
2 karththar Saaththaanaip Paarththu: Nee Engeyirundhu Varugiraai Endraar; Saaththaan Karththarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Boomiyengum Ulaavi Adhil Sutriththirindhu Varugiren Endraan.

3 appozhudhu Karththar Saaththaanai Nokki: Nee En Dhaasanaagiya Yobinmel Gavanam Vaiththaayo? Uththamanum, Sanmaarkkanum, Dhevanukku Bayandhu, Pollaappukku Vilagugiravanumaana Manushanaagiya Avanaippola Boomiyil Oruvanumillai; Mugaandharamillaamal Avanai Nirmoolamaakkumpadi Nee Ennai Evinapodhilum, Avan Innum Than Uththamaththile Urudhiyaai Nirkiraan Endraar.
4 saaththaan Karththarukkup Pradhiyuththaramaaga: Tholukkup Padhilaagath Tholaiyum, Than Jeevanukkup Padhilaagath Thanakku Undaana Ellaavatraiyum Manushan Koduththuviduvaan.
5 aanaalum Neer Ummudaiya Kaiyai Neetti, Avan Elumbaiyum Avan Maamsaththaiyum Thoduveeraanaal, Appozhudhu Avan Umadhu Mugaththukku Edhire Ummai Dhooshikkaano Paarum Endraan.
6 appozhudhu Karththar Saaththaanai Nokki: Idho, Avan Un Kaiyilirukkiraan; Aagilum Avan Praananaimaaththiram Thappavidu Endraar.
7 appozhudhu Saaththaan Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyaivittup Purappattu, Yobin Ullankaal Thodangi Avan Uchchanthalaimattum Kodiya Parukkalaal Avanai Vaadhiththaan.
8 avan Oru Ottai Eduththu, Thannai Surandikkondu Saambalil Utkaarndhaan.
9 appozhudhu Avan Manaivi Avanaip Paarththu: Neer Innum Ummudaiya Uththamaththil Urudhiyaai Nirkireero? Dhevanai Dhooshiththu Jeevanaividum Endraal.

10 adharku Avan: Nee Payiththiyakkaari Pesugiradhupolap Pesugiraai; Dhevan Kaiyile Nanmaiyaip Petra Naam Theemaiyaiyum Peravendaamo Endraan; Ivaigal Ellaavatrilum Yobu Than Udhadugalinaal Paavancheyyavillai.

11 yobudaiya Moondru Snegidharaagiya Themaaniyanaana Elippaasum, Soogiyanaana Pildhaadhum, Naagamaaththiyanaana Soppaarum, Yobukku Neritta Theemaigal Yaavaiyum Kelvippattapodhu, Avanukkaagap Paridhabikkavum, Avanukku Aarudhalsollavum Oruvarode Oruvar Yosanai Pannikkondu, Avaravar Thangal Sthalangalilirundhu Vandhaargal.

12 avargal Dhooraththil Varugaiyil Thangal Kangalai Ereduththup Paarththapodhu, Avanai Uruththeriyaamal, Saththamittu Azhudhu, Avaravar Thangal Saalvaiyaik Kizhiththu, Vaanaththaip Paarththu: Thangal Thalaigalmel Puzhudhiyaith Thootrikkondu,
13 vandhu, Avan Dhukkam Magaakodiya Dhukkam Endru Kandu, Oruvarum Avanodu Oru Vaarththaiyaiyum Pesaamal, Iravupagal Ezhunaal, Avanodukoodath Tharaiyile Utkaarndhirundhaargal.
